column3: [UniValue](https://github.com/jgarzik/univalue) constructor improvements welcomed...   a version 2.0 that ditches old APIs (no impact on bitcoin) is scheduled, fwiw.
Concept ACK - some NullUniValue changes could be scripted to be verifiably consistent and comprehensive
